title: Peter Grimes (Wednesday Theatre)
text:
"Peter Grimes" is a 1964 television play broadcast by the <a href="Australian%20Broadcasting%20Corporation">Australian Broadcasting Corporation</a>. It was based on the <a href="Peter%20Grimes">opera</a> by <a href="Benjamin%20Britten">Benjamin Britten</a> and directed by <a href="Christopher%20Muir">Christopher Muir</a>.
It aired as part of "<a href="Wednesday%20Theatre">Wednesday Theatre</a>".
Production.
The movie was shot in Melbourne.
